sentences.en: All that money brought nothing but sadness and misery and tragedy.
sentences.cn: 那笔钱带来的只有伤心、痛苦和悲剧。

sentences.en: Business depression usually causes misery among the working class.
sentences.cn: 商业不景气常使工薪阶层受苦.

sentences.en: Fame brought her nothing but misery.
sentences.cn: 名声只给她带来了痛苦。

sentences.en: He was in no way affected by their misery.
sentences.cn: 他们的惨状一点也没打动他的心.

sentences.en: Her search for love has often caused her excruciating misery and loneliness.
sentences.cn: 她对爱情的寻觅常常给她带来极大的痛苦和孤独感。

sentences.en: His face was a picture of sheer misery (= great unhappiness, with no other emotion ) .
sentences.cn: 他一脸的愁苦。

sentences.en: Please put me out of my misery. How do you do it?
sentences.cn: 别让我着急了。你是怎样做的？

sentences.en: She looked away so that Tom wouldn’t see her misery.
sentences.cn: 她扭过头去，不让汤姆看到自己的痛苦。

sentences.en: Tell me the end of the story — put me out of my misery.
sentences.cn: 告诉我故事的结果吧,别让我焦急地等了.

sentences.en: the miseries of war
sentences.cn: 战争造成的苦难

sentences.en: the misery of unemployment
sentences.cn: 失业的痛苦

sentences.en: The news plunged him into abject misery (= extreme unhappiness ) .
sentences.cn: 这消息让他陷入极度痛苦之中。

sentences.en: The people are plunged into an abyss of misery.
sentences.cn: 涂炭生灵.

sentences.en: Their energies were focussed on the alleviation of the refugees' misery.
sentences.cn: 他们把精力集中在减轻难民们的苦难上。

sentences.en: They were sickened by the scenes of misery and degradation they found.
sentences.cn: 目睹困苦、潦倒的景象，他们感到心里极不舒服。

sentences.en: This phobia can cause untold misery for the sufferer.
sentences.cn: 这种恐惧能给患者造成极度的痛苦.

sentences.en: This wretched war has brought misery to millions.
sentences.cn: 这场悲惨的战争为无数人带来了不幸。

sentences.en: War broke out again , plunging the people into misery and suffering.
sentences.cn: 战祸复发,生灵涂炭.

sentences.en: Waves of misery penetrated every pore.
sentences.cn: 痛苦深彻骨髓。

sentences.en: What we are witnessing here is human misery on a vast scale.
sentences.cn: 我们在这里所目睹的情景是许许多多的人都生活困苦。

sentences.en: Why was I putting myself through all this misery?
sentences.cn: 我为什么要如此自找苦吃啊？

phrases.phrase: make someone's life a misery (或 make life a misery
phrases.tran_cn: 使生活不断苦恼（或痛苦）

phrases.phrase: put someone/thing out of their misery

trans.tran_cn: 痛苦，不幸，穷困，悲惨的境遇
trans.tran_en: great suffering that is caused for example by being very poor or very sick
